repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

did.unittitle: Peter Spagnuolo Papers on Squatters' Rights

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Peter Spagnuolo in 2006. The accession number associated with this gift is 2006.004.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Peter Spagnuolo is a poet and author of The Squatter's Midden (2001) and Ten by Fourteen (2005). He was involved in the squatters' rights movement in New York City's East Village in the 1980s which culminated in Tompkins Square Park Police Riot of August 1988.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of subject files, clippings and legal documents relating to eviction of East Village Squatters as well as one videotape titled "By Any Means Necessary."

phystech.head: Audiovisual Access Policies and Procedures
phystech.p: Audiovisual materials have not been preserved and may not be available to researchers. Materials not yet digitized will need to have access copies made before they can be used. To request an access copy, or if you are unsure if an item has been digitized, please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu with the collection name, collection number, and a description of the item(s) requested. A staff member will respond to you with further information.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Born-digital materials have not been transferred and may not be available to researchers. Researchers may request access copies. To request that material be transferred, or if you are unsure if material has been transferred, please contact tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu with the collection name, collection number, and a description of the item(s) requested. A staff member will respond to you with further information.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection, created by Peter Spagnuolo, was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
